name: Sum(M)it
description:
This was a submission to Mini Jam 52, with theme Summit and limitation of WASD only.

In this game you'll find over 20 levels full of impossible equations you'll be able to solve.

The game also has 4 secret levels for you to find and solve, hidden within normal levels.

Discover new places  

New Rules
And break the system

Note: The limitation was WASD and Arrow keys ONLY, however, this game is better played using the rest of the keyboard as well.
Since I can't remove the limitation, I have decided to let you, the player, decide how you want to play.
If you don't care about the jam's restrictions, and you're not a participant in the jam, feel free to turn that option off in the main menu.

However you decide to play, remember to have fun, solve hard, and watch out for glitches. Seriously, they're everywhere...

The following two tracks have been used in the game. All other assets, (sprites, sound effects, level design, coding, ect.) have been made by me using Game Maker, Aseprite and Bfxr.

  • Midsummer Sky by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4049-midsummer-sky
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
  • Miami Nights - Extended Theme by Kevin MacLeod
    Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4044-miami-nights---extended-theme
    License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/
